import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { setAmount } from "../redux/actions/salBuyAction" import { useState } from "react" export const Sal = () => { const ds=useDispatch() const prod = useSelector(k => k.datareducerS.product) const currnt=useSelector(u=>u.datareducercu.currntCuc) const [buy,setbuy]=useState({ CusCode:currnt.id, Date:Date() }) const finish=()=>{ } return <> {prod.map((x, i) => ( ))}
